japanese: ねえ、フー君、どうしちゃったのかしら？
translation: Hey, what happened to Fu-kun?

japanese:
私たちの相手をすることで溜まったストレスが
ついに爆発した……？
translation:
Did the accumulated stress of dealing with us
finally explode...?

japanese:
えええっ！？
ストレスが爆発すると
あんな風になっちゃうものなの？
translation:
Whaaa?!
Does bursting from stress really
make you behave like that?

japanese:
それはわかりませんが……。
ストレス発散の方法は人それぞれですし……。
translation:
I don't know... But everyone has their own ways
of relieving stress...

japanese: じゃあ、変なもの食べたとか？
translation: Then, did he eat something weird?

japanese:
拾い食いでもしてない限り、私たちと同じものを
食べてるんだし、それはないと思うわ。
translation:
Unless he picked something up and ate it,
he's been eating the same food as us.
So I don't think so.

japanese: もしかして、二重人格？
translation: Could it be a split personality?

japanese:
お、それはちょっと面白いね。
ジキルとハイドみたいで。
translation:
Oh, that's kinda funny.
Like Jekyll and Hyde.

japanese: ……面白くはないと思います。
translation: ...I don't think that's funny.

japanese:
あっ！　わかった！
上杉さん、五つ子ならぬ双子説！
translation:
Ah! I got it!
Uesugi-san isn't part of quintuplets...
But he might have a twin!

japanese:
きっと、入れ替わりながら
私たちの前に現れてるんだよ！
それぞれ担当が決まってて！
translation:
They're just taking turns appearing in front of us,
each with a different role!

japanese:
じゃあ、あのテンションが高いフータローは
なんの担当？
translation: Then what is the Futaro with high energy's role?

japanese: ……爽やか担当？
translation: ...The role to refresh us?

japanese: わけがわからないんだけど……。
translation: I don't really get it...

japanese:
とにかく、ああなってしまった原因が
必ずあるはずです。
translation:
Anyway,
there must be a reason why things turned out like this.

japanese:
昨日の夜、別れてから、
今朝、五月が会うまでに
フータローに何かがあった……。
translation:
Something happened to Futaro between last night,
when we parted ways,
and this morning when he met Itsuki.

japanese:
なんかミステリーみたいになってきたね。
孤島だから舞台は完璧だし。
translation:
It's starting to feel like a mystery.
The fact that we're on a deserted island
makes for a perfect setting.

japanese:
おお！　みんな、こんなところにいたのか！
捜したぞ！
translation:
Oh!
There you guys are! I've been looking for you!

japanese: ひっ！？
translation: EEP?!

japanese: さっきと全然変わってない……。
translation: He hasn't changed at all from before...

japanese: 今度も、爽やか担当の上杉さんだね。
translation: He's still the refreshing Uesugi-san.

japanese: っていうか、さっきよりもテンション上がってない？
translation: Actually, he seems even more excited than before, huh?

japanese: 今度は何を言い出すのでしょう？
translation: What is he going to say this time?

japanese:
……変なこと言い出して
どうしようもなくなったときは、
みんなで取り押さえよっか。
translation:
...If he says something weird again
and we don't know what to do,
let's all grab him together.

japanese:
どうした？　家の中に籠もりきりで。
せっかくのバカンス、楽しまないともったいないぞ！
translation:
What's wrong? You've been cooped up inside the house.
You're wasting your vacation, so let's have some fun!

japanese:
さあ、思いっきり海で遊ぼうぜ！
そして、この夏を最高の想い出にしようぜ！
translation:
Right, let's play at the beach to our hearts' content!
And let's make this summer the best memory ever!

japanese:
そうそう、その調子！
みんなの視線はお兄ちゃんに釘付けだよ！
translation:
That's right, just like that!
Everyone is fixated on you, big bro!

japanese:
あのー、フータロー君？
念のために聞いておきたいんだけど、
海で何をするつもりなのかな？
translation:
Um, Futaro-kun?
Just to be sure,
what are you planning to do at the beach?

japanese: 遊ぶって言っただろ？
translation: I said play, didn't I?

japanese:
ああいや、うん、そういうことか！
どんなことをして遊ぶのか聞きたいんだな！
ははは、すまんすまん！
translation:
Ah, oh, I get it!
You were just wondering what exactly
we were going to do to play, huh! Hahaha, sorry, sorry!

japanese: なんか、このフー君、疲れるんだけど……。
translation:
Is it just me,
or is this Fu-kun exhausting to be around...

japanese: 私もです……。
translation: I agree...

japanese:
うーん、泳ぐのは当然として
スイカ割りというのはどうだろう！
translation:
Well, obviously we could swim
or we could split a watermelon!

japanese:
あとは、ビーチバレーをしたり、
みんなで砂に埋まってみたり！
translation:
And we can also play beach volleyball,
or bury ourselves in the sand together!

japanese: そ、それ以外のことは……何もしないのよね？
translation:
U-um, we're not going to do anything else...
right?

japanese:
フッ、もしかしたら
サプライズがあるかもしれないな！
translation: Heh, maybe there will be a surprise!

japanese: 怖すぎる……そのサプライズ……。
translation: I'm scared...of whatever that suprise is...

japanese:
なに言ってるんだ三玖！
夏は思いっきり冒険したほうが
いいに決まってるだろ？
translation:
What are you saying, Miku?!
It's summer, the best time to have an adventure!

japanese:
冒険は嫌いじゃないですが、
変なことにならないですよね？
translation:
I don't hate adventures,
but it won't turn into something weird, right?

japanese:
当たり前だろ？
安心安全が俺のモットーだぜ？
translation:
Of course not, yeah?
Safety and security are my motto!

japanese:
……そう強調されると、
余計に信じられないのですが。
translation:
...The more you emphasize that,
the less I believe it.

japanese:
なんだなんだ？
もしかして、みんなは海で遊ぶことより……
まさか！　勉強――
translation:
What's wrong? Instead of playing in the ocean,
are you guys perhaps thinking about...
Could it be?! Studying%p-2;――

japanese: みんなー！　今から海で遊ぶよー！
translation: Hey, everyone! Let's go play in the ocean now!

japanese: そうね、想い出作りをするんだものね！
translation: That's right, we're going to make memories, huh!

japanese: 勉強のことは忘れる約束だし。
translation: We'd promised to forget studying.

japanese: じゃあ、さっそく準備ですね！
translation: Alright, let's get ready right now!

japanese: それでは上杉君、またあとで！
translation: Okay, Uesugi-kun, see you later!

japanese: おう！　みんなで楽しもうな！
translation: Yeah! Let's have some fun together!

japanese:
うんうん、上手くいったねお兄ちゃん！
やればできるって信じてたよ！
translation:
Good, good, you did great, big bro!
I knew you had it in ya!
